Package org.gradle.api.credentials

Interface Credentials

All Known Subinterfaces:
AwsCredentials, HttpHeaderCredentials, PasswordCredentials, PasswordCredentials
All Known Implementing Classes:
HttpBuildCacheCredentials
@NonExtensible public interface Credentials
Base interface for credentials used for different authentication purposes. (e.g authenticated RepositoryHandler)
